core.​ math.​ XPS_fnc_getRelPos
_pos = [_startPos, _dir, _dist, *_heightAdjust] call XPS_fnc_getRelPos
Description

Returns a position (in 3D coordinates) that is relative in direction and distance from given start position. Optional relative height (Z) change can be included.

Authors

CrashDome

Parameters
_startPos
Array

Coordinates in 2D or 3D format. If 2D is given, Z is assumed 0

_dir
Number

The direction (in degrees 'world')

_dist
Number

The distance (in meters 'world')

_hieghtAdjust
Number

[Optional - Default : 0] - The difference in height (in meters 'world')

Returns
_pos
Array

The relative position in 3D world coordinates

Examples
2D
_sPos = [100,100];
_ePos = [_sPos, 180, 100] call XPS_fnc_getRelPos;
// result is : [100, 0, 0]
3D with height change
_sPos = [100,100,0];
_ePos = [_sPos, 90, 100, 100] call XPS_fnc_getRelPos;
// result is : [200, 100, 100]
